# Prepocessing

Aggregate university ranks per country per year.
```{r}
# Bin universities into ranges and assign points.
df_uni <- df_uni %>%
    mutate(Points = case_when(
        Rank >= 1 & Rank < 10 ~ 100,
        Rank >= 10 & Rank < 50 ~ 50,
        Rank >= 50 & Rank < 100 ~ 25,
        Rank >= 100 ~ 10
  ))
```
```{r}
df_uni_agg <- df_uni %>%
    group_by(ISO3.CODE, Country, Year) %>%
    summarise(Points = sum(Points)) %>%
    na.omit()
```
